item.title: Eating Elephants
item.description: Q: How do you eat an elephant? A: One bite at a time. Sometimes I forget things that are obviously true. Like the fact that there are only so many days in a lifetime, and only so many minutes in a day. Or that the people I admire worked insanely hard to achieve what they did, and so must I. These are the invariants. When the journey is long and uncomfortable,
